shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a remote user enables or disables the local video capture.
Callback when a remote user enables/disables local video capture.
Callback when a remote user enables/disables local video capture.
Callback when a remote user enables or disables local video capture.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int remoteUid, bool enabled)? onUserEnableLocalVideo;
public virtual void OnUserEnableLocalVideo(RtcConnection connection, uint remoteUid, bool enabled) {}

dlentry.dd:
Deprecated: This callback is deprecated. Use the following enumerations of the callback instead:
RemoteVideoStateStopped(0) and RemoteVideoStateReasonRemoteMuted(5).
RemoteVideoStateDecoding (2) and RemoteVideoStateReasonRemoteUnmuted(6).

Deprecated: This callback has been deprecated. Use the following enumerations in the callback instead:
RemoteVideoStateStopped(0) and RemoteVideoStateReasonRemoteMuted(5).
RemoteVideoStateDecoding (2) and RemoteVideoStateReasonRemoteUnmuted(6).

Deprecated: This callback is deprecated. Use the following enums in the callback instead:
remoteVideoStateStopped(0) and remoteVideoStateReasonRemoteMuted(5).
remoteVideoStateDecoding (2) and remoteVideoStateReasonRemoteUnmuted(6).

Deprecated: This callback is deprecated. Use the callback with the following enumerations:
REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE_STOPPED(0) and REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_MUTED(5).
REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE_DECODING (2) and REMOTE_VIDEO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_UNMUTED(6).

section.p: This callback is triggered when the remote user calls the method to enable or disable video capture.
This callback is triggered when a remote user calls the method to enable or disable video capture.
This callback is triggered when a remote user calls the method to enable or disable video capture.
This callback is triggered when a remote user calls the method to enable or disable video capture.

plentry.pd: The user ID indicating whose video stream it is.

Whether the remote user enables video capture:
: The user has enabled video. Other users can receive this user’s video stream.
: The user has disabled video. The user can still receive video streams from others, but others cannot receive this user’s video stream.
User ID indicating whose video stream it is.

Whether the remote user has enabled video capture:
: The user has enabled video. Other users can receive this user's video stream.
: The user has disabled video. The user can still receive video streams from others, but others cannot receive this user's video stream.
User ID indicating which user's video stream it is.

Whether the remote user enables video capture:
: The user has enabled the video function. Other users can receive this user's video stream.
: The user has disabled the video function. This user can still receive other users' video streams, but others cannot receive this user's video stream.
User ID indicating which user's video stream it is.

Whether the remote user enables video capture:
: The user has enabled the video feature. Other users can receive this user's video stream.
: The user has disabled the video feature. The user can still receive other users' video streams, but others cannot receive this user's video stream.
